entry.title: Starting again my website
entry.summary:
Last night I did prepare a big post to use in some service and it didn't work. Final store? I lost everything that I wrote.

After that I decided re-create my website. I tried it in 2016 but as I moved to another country I didn't have time to it â€¦
entry.content:
Last night I did prepare a big post to use in some service and it didn't work. Final store? I lost everything that I wrote.

After that I decided re-create my website. I tried it in 2016 but as I moved to another country I didn't have time to it.

So, when I have something to write we will be here.

Regarding my old posts stored on IBM DeveloperWorks and WordPress, I didn't decide about migrate it to here. Opinions are welcomed.
